From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>



* Iris detected the Predacon's fleeing the scene but kept up the weapon's 
power until she was sure that they were all gone, her systems suddenly 
blipped as the island's controls were blasted.
She was running out of energy so that she didn't have enough to repair the 
damaged systems, but she had just enough to let the weapon begin to fade 
slowly.*

__________________________________________________________:)

* Iron Raptor ran into the base, the Predacon's now fleeing the scene, she 
opened her com-link to Iris for a stats report...*

" Iris, give me the beat on the situation."
IRIS: "The Predacons are running but not before a certain bot named Rampage 
destroyed the island's controls. I can't repair them! Not enough power left. 
Sorry."

* Iron Raptor kept on running but let a sigh escape her lips, so her plan to 
defeat the Preds had to be postponed...big deal! But she still could follow 
through with the remainder of it...*

" That's okay Iris, you have done enough. Take a break."

* She then turned to Teltoli and gestured towards a hall leading off to the 
weapon's hold.*

" I hope that I can trust you enough to follow the way to the weapon's hold 
and gather as many weapons as your arms can carry, then follow the hall to 
your left to the bridge. Dump the weapons off there. I'll be there when you 
come..."

* Iron Raptor opened her com-link to Fracturcon as she continued to run 
towards the bridge and left Teltoli to her orders...*

" I require to know your name, please. Also, how good are you at repair?"

* She knew that there were plenty of bots that could now repair the Ark's 
systems but she had to give the new bot a try, it wouldn't be fair if she 
didn't.
Iron Raptor then had to worry about the defence of the Ark while the repair 
was under way, that was what she needed toe weapons for.
Once the weapons were at the bridge she would call the Maximals to come and 
pick them up, then hopefully station them around the Ark as protection.
It would then be time to put some sort of plan into action, one that was 
just waiting to be used!*
